examples.text: When did we announce the S924?
When does p704 go end of life?
When does the System p 520 go End of Life?
When will an IBM Power System 780 stop being supported?
What is the End of Service date for an IBM Power 550?
What is the Withdrawn from Marketing date for S814?
What is the EoS date for the pSeries 710?
When does the E870C go WDFM?
Do we still sell a p770?

dialog_nodes.title: Check a date for an IBM Power System by MTM

values.text: I think you are wanting to check the @Lifecycle_date date for an IBM Power System server
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
Hello, I'm Robert, David Spurway's wee Virtual Assistant. How can I help you?
So far, I am quite good at finding life cycle dates for IBM Power Systems, based on the POWER processor generations between POWER5 and POWER9.
If that sound helpful, ask away!
